page.title: 05Farming-Oyster Farm-cont'd.
page.content: The next stage is to put the baby oysters into larger tanks and feed them.They feed on microscopic plants called algae. The algae is also grown at the farm in a very wet and hot room which we were also shown. The tanks of algae are bright green. As the oysters feed on the algae they grow quite quickly and the tanks are sealed carefully to prevent the oysters escaping.The final stage is in an out of doors oyster bed before they are sold.They are now about 4 mm.long.Most of them are sold abroad to such countries as,South Africa,Italy,Denmark and France, where they are placed in special sea beds until ready to eat.The oyster farm was built at Reculver because there is plenty of sea water, it pumped from the sea into a system of pipes which keeps it fresh.
